fields.name: Palo Santo/White Sage Clearing Spray
fields.description: 100mls. Don‚Äôt have time to do a total house or crystal cleanse or experienced bad juju or sickness? Try our new Palo Santo/White Sage Clearing Spray made with 100% organic Palo Santo and White Sage Essential oils. It‚Äôs very refreshing and a smokeless way to cleanse your crystals, space and aura. And of course yourself. Also infused with Tuning Fork Energy. Directions: Spray yourself (approx 30cm from body) to cleanse yourself of any negative energy. Lightly spray your crystals, house and/or car. Please note - please be cautious about spraying on crystals that are sensitive to water. Caution: Although this spray is made with all natural ingredients, skin irritation can occur on sensitive skin. Please discontinue use should this happen. Do not spray into eyes. Pregnant/nursing mothers should consult with your doctor. Keep out of reach of children.

fields.name: Charcoal Discs - Toxic free 100% Bamboo Roll of 10
fields.description: These toxic free 100% bamboo charcoal discs allow you to burn resin, dried herbs or incense powder with ease. Simply place in a heatproof dish or on top of a layer of salt, light the disc (which could take a few minutes), wait until you see the sparks and place a small amount of resin on top. One roll contains 10 discs. Potassium Nitrate FREE.

fields.name: Chazuta Peru Ceremonial Cacao
fields.description: 500g. This beautiful 100% organic Cacao (Theobroma Cacao) is made in a small town called Chazuta which is in Northern Peru at the edge of the Amazon Basin and nestled in the foot hills of the Andes. It is planted, harvested, fermented, dried and milled using delicate methods with love by Family Casa Qoya Peru and is 100% ethical and sustainable all whilst keeping all the healing properties inside. Ingredients: Only 100% Pure Organic Cacao (Theobroma cacao). Product of Peru. Vegan ‚Ä¢ Lactose Free ‚Ä¢ Sugar Free ‚Ä¢ Soy Free ‚Ä¢ Gmo Free ‚Ä¢ Preservative Free.

fields.name: Ceremonial Cacao Peru
fields.description: 600g. Ceremonial Cacao - Pure Bliss. Ceremonial cacao is the pure form of chocolate. It is simply the sacred cacao bean straight off the tree, lightly fermented and melted down into a block. Ceremonial Cacao is packed full of vitamins and minerals and increases blood flow to the brain which helps to strengthen awareness and focus. It helps the body to heal, detoxify and to give your immune system a good boost and it also increases your energy. 100% organic. Gluten Free. GMO Free. Fair Trade. Vegan.
